msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
build scripts..just minor fixes and making it player 10
FxComponent - required parts must be present--not just defined
FxContainer - removing some dead code around IUIComponent since everything should be an IVisualElement now
Group - move around logic for removing a previously parented object.  This helps deal with graphic elements with shared display objects
GraphicElement - need to handle display object getting changed as well
AdvancedLayoutFeatures - remove Vector import (now that build scripts are fixed, it works fine)
QE Notes: Write tests for addAll() and allAllAt(), check that required parts are required in the first state
tests: checkintests, mustella DataGroup, List, Group, FxContainer, FxDataContainer
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Make the Group share its display object with the GraphicElements by default.
QE Notes: Add a test-case and make sure that a plain Group with bunch of GraphicElements doesn't have any child display objects (numChildren == 0).
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Group.checkForRangeError() now checks for negative index values.
QE Notes: Tests that passed negative numbers to the group API's will now fail with an RTE. Previous behavior was undefined.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Change the way we handle setItemAt in DataGroup..we now do it synchronously again.  However, this has the consequence that, even temporarily, you are not allowed to have the save visual element listed twice in the data collection.
Get parity with Halo behavior and Flash behavior by allowing addElement()/addElementAt() to be called on an element already in the list.  When this happens just shift the indices around.
Small ASDoc fix in GroupBase.  Also, change the way we handle data being set int he default complex item renderer...this way we're not using binding, and the code is also easier to understand.
QE Notes: Write tests for addElement/addElementAt on items already in the group.
tests: checkintests, mustella DataGroup, List, Group, FxContainer, FxDataContainer
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Cleanups in Group and DataGroup.  Change RTEs so not as many will have to be localized.  Also, when mxmlContent is set, we clean up the old mxmlContent better and send out remove events.
QE Notes: Need to write tests when the mxmlContent gets set (remove events get dispatched).
tests: checkintests, mustella Group, DataGroup, FxDataContainer, FxContainer, FxList, and GraphicTags tests
